service=new AayosService;Promise.all([service.getVehicleCount(),service.getOpenTicketCount(),service.getActiveTechnicianCount(),service.getPendingPredictionCount()]).then(([vehicles,tickets,techs,predictions])=>{setStats({totalVehicles:vehicles,openTickets:tickets,activeTechnicians:techs,pendingPredictions:predictions})})},[]);let navigateTo=url=>{window.location.href=`/aayos_admin${url}`};return
